validationReport.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.

rule.description: All properties specified in XMP form shall use either the predefined schemas defined in the XMP Specification, ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005, or any extension schemas that comply with 6.6.2.3.2
rule.test: isPredefinedInXMP2005 == true || isDefinedInMainPackage == true || isDefinedInCurrentPackage == true

check.errorMessage: XMP property is either not predefined, or is not defined in any XMP extension schema
XMP property is either not predefined, or is not defined in any XMP extension schema
XMP property is either not predefined, or is not defined in any XMP extension schema

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not
rule.test: containsFontFile == false || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || containsCIDSet == false || cidSetListsAllGlyphs == true

check.errorMessage: A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset
A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset
A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset

rule.description: All properties specified in XMP form shall use either the predefined schemas defined in the XMP Specification, ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005, or any extension schemas that comply with 6.6.2.3.2

check.errorMessage: XMP property does not correspond to type null
XMP property does not correspond to type null
XMP property does not correspond to type seq resourceevent
XMP property does not correspond to type resourceref
XMP property does not correspond to type null

rule.description: ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117

check.errorMessage: A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry

rule.description: DeviceGray shall only be used if a device independent DefaultGray colour space has been set when the DeviceGray colour space is used, or if a PDF/A OutputIntent is present

check.context: root/document[0]/pages[1](1 0 obj PDPage)/contentStream[0](4 0 obj PDContentStream)/operators[70]/xObject[0](81 0 obj PDXImage)/imageCS[0]
check.errorMessage: DeviceGray colour space is used without output intent profile

rule.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema

check.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/A Identification Schema

rule.description: If the document does not contain a PDF/A OutputIntent, then all Page objects that contain transparency shall include the Group key, and the attribute dictionary that forms the value of that Group key shall include a CS entry whose value shall be used as the default blending colour space
rule.test: gOutputCS != null || containsGroupCS == true || containsTransparency == false

check.errorMessage: The page contains transparent objects with no blending colour space defined

rule.description: Except for annotation dictionaries whose Subtype value is Popup, all annotation dictionaries shall contain the F key

check.errorMessage: A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
A dictionary of Link annotation does not contain F key
